name: vertex_count
description: A polygon should accurately count the number of verticies it contains

name: edge_count
description: A polygon should accurately count the number of edges it contains

name: is_square
description: A rectangle should be able to accurately determine if it is a square

name: area
description: A shape should be able to accurately calculate its area

name: perimeter
description: A shape should be able to accurately calculate its perimeter (or circumference)

name: radius
description: A circle should be able to accurately calculate its radius

name: diameter
description: A circle should be able to accurately calculate its diameter

name: non_numeric
description: Using a non-numeric radius should throw an error
